pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Dose Escalation Using Deep Reinforcement Learning // An implementation to compute an optimal dose escalation rule using deep reinforcement learning in phase I oncology trials (Matsuura et al. (2023) doi:10.1080/10543406.2023.2170402). The dose escalation rule can directly optimize the percentages of correct selection (PCS) of the maximum tolerated dose (MTD).
